Articles.Content: Welp. I will be active again for a bit. Sorry about my absence, I was moving and..... Short version I was busy. so HAAI!
No one is happy to see me? :\'(
Sometimes when I\'m lonely I bring my laptop under the covers to have the heat against me and if I try really hard I can pretend the fan is a heartbeat... :\'(
Awww, as tragic as that is, I\'m stealing it for the next time i need to write a lonely character.
